definition: To fail to notice or see something, especially when it is right in front of you or within your field of vision. This term is commonly used to describe unintentionally overlooking or missing something, often due to distraction or inattentiveness.

examples.german: Sie hat die rote Ampel übersehen.
examples.english: She didn't see the red traffic light.

examples.german: Der Kellner hat unsere Bestellung übersehen.
